1411221221222212221121.title: Sorrow

14112212212222122211212.content:
(This portion will be told from Jason's POV)

You both decide to keep to yourselves for now. It seems like everyone else has enough to worry about

at the moment. You yourself then come to a realization. Winnie can see the stern look on your face.

“What's the matter Jason”? She asked. “”Nothing. It's just, with all that's going on I can't help but feel

that I'm ill equipped to handle what's to come” you reply. You get up making your way to Ms.

Grimwoods office. “Where are you going”? She asks again. You turn back to her. “To see my dad”. You

go to open the office door but it flings open and your dad is standing in the doorway. You look up at

him. “Dad let's walk”. He nods in agreement and you both walk out side. You both begin walking

around the grounds. “Dad, I can't even begin to tell you how happy I am that your alive” you say as you

embrace him in a hug. He returns the hug and pats you on the head in reassurance. “Yes, but putting all

that aside, we need to think about what comes next”. You dad nods in agreement. “You know better

than anyone what Freddy is capable of, and I'm not prepared for what's to come”. He continues to nod

in agreement. “I need your help dad. Train me, give me the strength to take these jokers down for the

count. Your dad puts a hand on your shoulder and nods. Your dad reaches into his coat and pulls out his

machete and hands it to you. “Y-your machete”? You ask. He nods again in approval. He motions for

you to follow him. You both begin walking towards the woods when Winnie comes running out. “Now

where are you going”? She asks in concern. You walk over to her, putting your hands on her shoulders.

“Winnie, my dad and I need to train and prepare ourselves for what comes next. I don't know exactly

where were going or how long I'll be, but know this.” you say lifting her chin so that she may meet

your gaze. “Everything I'm doing is for you”. You both then kiss passionately. “I'll be waiting” she says.

“Stay safe” you reply. Then you and your father resume your trek into the wilderness.

14112212212222122211212112.title: Weapons Hunt

choices: One of Freddy's Minions Show Up
141122122122221222112121121.content:
Both you and Winnie embrace each other in a passionate hug. “I missed you too” you say. “So how was

the training”? She asked. “It was pretty tough, but the hardest part was being away from you” you reply

as you place your thumb and index finger under her chin. “Aww, that's the corniest thing I've ever

heard” she replied as you lift up your mask and the two of you lock lips in a romantic kiss. “Sigh, that

was the highlight of my week” you say. This makes Winnie blush and giggle. You both begin to walk

back to the school, holding each others' hand. Before you get there however, you have an idea. You stop

walking and Winnie feels a snag. She looks back to you slightly confused. “Come with me” you say in

a soothing voice. “It's been over a week since I've seen you”. “Whoa”! Winnie yells in surprise as you

pick her up, holding her in a bridal position. “And I think it HIGH time that we got some ALONE

time” you say looking deeply into her eyes. “Ooohhh. Teehee” She giggled. “Well then” she replied,

placing a hand on your cheek. “I'm all yours” she whispered. You carry Winnie into the woods and into

the bog. You reach the edge of the swamp and set Winnie down. “This is my favorite spot” you say.

“The swamp, the muck, the sludge, the eery mist”. “Yeah, it's beautiful” Says Winnie. “Not as beautiful

as you” you reply. “Oh stop” she says blushing even more intensely. Time passes and the sun sets and

the moon rises high into the sky. You see that it's a full moon. “I love how the moon reflects in the

swamp at night” says Winnie. “I love how how exuberant your eyes look in the moonlight” you reply.

You both lean in close to each other. “I love you”. She says. “And I love you” you reply, lifting up your

mask. You both then begin to kiss each other passionately as you wrap your arms around one another,

holding each other tight. Winnie then pushes you forcefully to the ground. You look up at her, seeing

her eyes continue to shine brilliantly in the moonlight. “You know” she begins to say seductively. “It IS

a full moon tonight, and I am feeling rather aggressive” she says, smiling, bearing her sharp teeth. She

then leans in close to you, licking her lips in a very coy manner. What happens next?

1411221221222212221121211212121.title: Brief Encounter

14112212212222122211212112121211.content:
Jason continues to sketch Winnie as she lays on her bed. “How's it coming”? She asks. “I'm just

about done” he said as he looked back down at the paper to put on the finishing touches. “Alright

Winnie, I'm fini-” he stopped in mid sentence when he saw that Winnie was no longer on her bed. He

then felt someone grab him from behind. “Whoa” said Jason as he was thrown onto Winnie's bed. He

looked up to see that Winnie had hopped up on top of him, wearing nothing but her bra and panties and

she let out a soft, teasing growl. “You know” she began to say in a seductive tone. “It's getting pretty

late, and I'm sure everyone else is asleep by now.....and guess what” she said leaning in close to

whisper in his ear. “I'm not tired”. Jason's eyes went wide. He didn't have to be told twice. He threw off

his jacket, shirt, and pants faster that you can say slasher film. Now in nothing but his underwear he

came back to bed and pulled himself under the covers on top of Winnie. “Are you sure about thi-

MMPH”! He was interrupted as Winnie gave him her answer in the form of a passionate kiss. He

quickly began doing the same. As things got heated, Jason unhooked Winnie's bra, revealing her small

but perky breasts. Winnie in return, ripped off Jason's undergarment and tossed it across the room,

revealing his more than ready member. They looked into each others' eyes as they were both blushing

intensely, not from embarrassment, but from the sheer ecstasy of the moment. Then Jason removed

Winnie's panties and prepared himself for what came next. “Are you ready for this” he asked one last

time, looking for reassurance. Winnie wrapped her arms around him, embracing him as she brought her

face closer to his. “More than you know” she replied. Jason took that as his cue and took the plunge.

The bed began to squeak softly, the sheets were being ruffled, and the soft exhales of Jason and Winnie

were let out as small, almost inaudible moans. The two began moving in a rhythmic up and down

motion under the sheets as the two were in a world of pure pleasure and ecstasy. They both continued

for some time and eventually fell asleep in each others' arms.

1411221221222212221121211212121111.title: Grimwood Vs. Calloway

14112212212222122211212112121211111.content:
The boys from the Calloway Camp were in a frightened frenzy as they ran and hid from the masked

psychopath. “It's Michael Myers”! One of the girls shrieked. The masked giant remained silent as he

began to slowly walk up to girls, knife in hand. Jason Jr. knew of what Myers was planning to do and

was intent on stopping him. He stepped away from Winnie and quickly pulled out his machete. “J.J.!

What are you doing”?! She asked. “Hey Myers, why don't you quit scaring little girls and take on

someone your own size. Myers slowly turned his head towards Jason Jr. He then began walking

towards him in a sluggish manner. J.J. Stood his ground waiting for the lumbering giant to make his

way over to him. Then everyone heard a loud BANG! And shuttered. Everyone immediately clasped

their hands over their ears. J.J. Turned to see a smoking gun in the Colonel's hand and a bullet hole in

the side of Myers' mask. “You aren't going to put a FINGER on these children mister”! Said the

Colonel, thinking he had vanquished the giant. To his horror however, Myers simply turned his head

towards him, and he started trudging his way towards Calloway. “What”?! Said the Colonel. He began

firing round after round into Myers as he continued to make his way over to him. To no avail however

as he ran out of bullets and Myers was still standing. Just as he was about to reach Calloway he raised

his knife over his hand, arching it to strike. Calloway flinched, expecting the worst. “KYAH”! Yelled

J.J. As he slashed Myers in the back, leaving a huge gash going down from his shoulder, to his hip.

This had no affect however. All it managed to do was draw his attention back towards J.J. Myers turned

to face him and threw a hard punch right at J.J.'s chest, sending him flying back and crashing through

the school. “Jason”! Yelled Winnie, worried for her boyfriend's safety. Myers then started walking

towards Winnie. Before he got to her however, another figure caught hi eye. A man in a hockey with a

torn trench coat, and a large machete in hand. It was Jason Sr.! Both killers stared each other down as

they walked towards one another. Then they came face to face, neither saying a word. Then Myers

thrust his knife into Jason's heart. Jason merely looked down to see it, then slowly looked back up at

Myers. He then threw a solid punch to Myers' face, sending him flying fifty feet back into the woods,

knocking over trees and debris. Jason slid the knife down to his belly as he took the liberty of taking out the knife and

tossed it to the ground. Once the debris cleared, everyone could see Myers back up on his feet. Before

Jason could go after his unarmed adversary however, he vanished in a cloud of black smoke. Everyone

breathed a sigh of relief as Myers departed. “Oh no! J.J.!” said Winnie as she ran to the hole J.J left in

the school after he was sent crashing through it. She and the others began excavating through the debris

looking for Jason Jr.
14112212212222122211212112121211111.title: Duel of the Silent Slashers

141122122122221222112121121212111111.content:
Winnie moved the broken remains of wall seeing Jason knocked out as she pulled him out as Jason Sr walked up carrying him inside laying him down as Mary pulled out some high tech laptop-looking thing doing a search on Micheal
"Michael Audrey Myers was born on October 19, 1957. He had an older sister named Judith and a younger sister. The family resided in a two-story house at 45 Lampkin Lane in the surburban town of Haddonfield, Illinois. On October 31, 1963, a six-year old Michael dressed as a clown for Halloween and watched his sister & her boyfriend kissing before going upstairs to have sex. Taking a knife out of the kitchen drawer and waiting for Judith's boyfriend to leave, Michael then snuck up the stairs and repeatedly stabbed his sister to death. After watching her die, he left the house only to be discovered by his astonished parents, who had just returned home. Michael was sent to Smith's Grove Warren County Sanitarium for his crime, where he would remain until his twenty-first birthday until he could be tried as an adult. At Smith's Grove, Michael received psychiatric treatment from Doctor Sam Loomis. Upon spending time with the boy, Loomis concluded that it was a hopeless case that Michael Myers had no humanity left. He pleaded his case that Myers be moved to a more secure facility, but his superiors refused to listen and ordered that he remain in the "adequate" Smith's Grove In 1965, Michael's parents were killed in a car accident, and his little sister was adopted by the Strode family, who renamed her Laurie. The Strodes brought Laurie to visit Michael at Smith's Grove on at least one occasion when she was still a little girl.
October 30, 1978, the 21-year-old Michael Myers destroyed his room at Smith's Grove and carved the word "sister" on his door before breaking out. He also released the other patients from their rooms. At the same time, Dr. Loomis and Nurse Marion Chambers were arriving at the facility to transfer Myers for his court hearing. Noticing the patients roaming around outside the hospital, Loomis got out the car to investigate as Michael attacked Marion and sped away in their station wagon. As he drove across Illinois, Michael stopped to murder a truck driver to steal his boiler suit. Travelling to Haddonfield, Michael returned to his childhood home. The next day on Halloween, a teenaged Laurie Strode dropped off a key at the Myers house for her realtor father, and was immediately recognized by her brother. Michael proceeded to stalk her and her friends Annie and Lynda throughout the afternoon. He also stole Judith's gravestone from the local cemetery, and broke into Nicol's Hardware to acquire knives, rope, and a white Halloween mask. Meanwhile, Dr. Loomis had followed Michael to Haddonfield and warned town sheriff Leigh Brackett of the danger he posed. That night, as Laurie and Annie were babysitting across the street from each other, Michael watched them from the shadows. He murdered Annie first, strangling her in her car as she left to meet her boyfriend, before slitting her throat. Later, Lynda and her boyfriend Bob showed up, only to fall victim to Michael as well. Worried about her missing friends, Laurie crossed the street to investigate, only to find Annie's body arranged under Judith Myers' gravestone, and Lynda and Bob hidden in the closets. Michael lunged at his sister, catching her on the arm with his knife, and she ran for help. Michael followed her across the street, and Laurie was forced to stab him with both a knitting needle and his own knife. As Michael rose from apparent death to resume his attack on Laurie, Dr. Loomis appeared and shot him six times, causing him to fall off the balcony. When Loomis went to check the body, Michael had vanished.Michael Myers' body was never found in 1978, although many simply assumed him dead.Michael Myers seemed to contain superhuman strength, having been able to lift a tombstone out of the ground and also seemed to withstand critical injuries that would normally result in death, such as being shot, stabbed, electrocuted, or even burned. He also seems to be able to regenerate lost tissue"
the webpage read
141122122122221222112121121212111111.title: The story of Michael

he said as Ghostface responded
"My pleasure"
Ghostface said appearing out of nowhere as Wolfman tackled him phasing right thru him as Ghostface turned laughing as they heard Freddy
"That's our cue boys"
Freddy said melting thru the floorboard cracks forming as Michael jumped thru a window
"What the...Voorhees kid is still alive"
Freddy said as Winnie jumped clawing him in the face as he caught her throwing her against a brick wall as the five clawmarks started bleeding as he rubbed his finger licking it as the wounds vanished
"Winnie,you probaly shouldn't have done that"
you say as Leatherface broke down the door
"Leatherface,take care of her!"
Freddy yelled whispering in his ear
"I want her alive but cut her up as much as you wish"
Freddy whispered as Leatherface slowly walked up to Winnie as Wolfman and Frankenstein jumped in front of her as Leatherface started his chainsaw preparing to strike as your dad tackled him to the ground as the saw made a deep gash in the Wolfman's leg as he screamed in pain as Leatherface got up
"Run and split up"
you yell as everyone except your dad split in groups and ran away
"Oh no you don't"
Ghostface said turning into a cloud of black smoke seperating into 3 Ghostface clones
14112212212222122211212112121211111111.title: Halloween Party (pt 2)

141122122122221222112121121212111111111.content:
The 3 Ghostface clones started laughing as they each pulled out a weird gun-looking thing firing a green mist as the killers put on some fumagation masks as everyone else started getting sleepy as they fell over knocked out
"Ok get these girls loaded, and you i special treatment"
Freddy said pointing at J.J.as they killers loaded them on a truck driving off as it was traveling away inside the truck bed Ghostface,Freddy and Micheal were playing cards as Leatherface was driving
"Freddy why did we have to leave i could've cut their fathers up good"
Ghostface said
"Because Ghosty we have to transport the kids before they wake up"
Freddy said smacking Ghostface as Micheal hit Freddy
"Why you son of a bitch"
Freddy said throwing micheal hitting Leatherface as he stood up
"Leatherface!,the wheel you idiot"
Freddy and Ghostface shouted as the truck drove over a big tree as two of the bodybags flew out of the back un-noticed as Leatherface grabbed the wheel driving off
"Keep hold on that wheel"
Ghostface said
the two bodybags started moving as a blade cut thru one of them as Jason Jr. crawled out seeing the other bag he pushed on it hearing muffled screaming as he cut the bag seeing Sibella
"Where are we?"
you ask her as she has no idea but saw the truck fading in the distance
"That's the truck we were in, i'm gonna fallow it"
Sibella said taking on her bat form flapping off
(at the castle)
the truck pulled up unloading 7 bodybags
"Micheal you idiot you left 2 behind"
Freddy yelled at him
"Well just tie them up already"
Revolta said meeting them
141122122122221222112121121212111111111.title: kidnapped

1411221221222212221121211212121111111111.content:
"Butterfingers here left 2 of the kids behind"
Ghostface said pointing at Freddy
"No Leatherface was the one who loaded them"
Freddy said as the yelled at eachother until Ghost turned his head to a tree
"I sense something"
he said throwing his knife in a tree as Sibella (in bat form) fell out with the knife stuck in her wing as Ghostface pulled it out as she changed back
"Girl, you've got guts, it's a shame i'm gotta rip em out"
Freddy said as Sibella yelled out for Jason
"Voorhees jr. can't help you"
Ghostface said as Leather picked her up giving her another dose of the green gas as the killers carried them inside J.J. popped outta hiding sneaking around them inside the castle the girls were tied up with handcuffs that prevented them from using their powers as J.J. snuck inside thru small passages fiding the cage as the girls saw J.J. cheered up as he put his finger over his mouth
"Be quiet'
he whispered inspecting the cage he jammed the tip of his curved machete in the keyhole of the lock jingling it as the cage popped open
"Hold out your hands and put them on that stone"
Jason said as the girls did as told J.J. swung the machete breaking the handcuffs
"Not so fast!"
the heard turning to see a boiling red Freddy
"Voorhees i'm gonna rip out your lungs for this"
Freddy yelled as the girls cowarded in fear as Freddy laughed
"I got it girls sit on the ground close your eyes and do nothing"
you say to the girls as the reluctantly do what you say
"Pay attention to me you bags of flesh,you can't ignore me"
Freddy said as they heard knifes sharpening Leatherface's chainsaw and Ghostface laughing as they continued to close their eyes as the sounds died out they opened their eyes seeing Freddy and all the killers gone
"What happened?"
Mary asked
"All along Freddy needed one thing from us,Fear and when we couldn't give him what he nedded he couldn't live"
you say as the 9 of you leave the castle
"Does anyone know stickshift?"
Winnie asked as you and the girls got in the car
1411221221222212221121211212121111111111.title: The Final battle

1411221221222212221121211212121111111111.content:
You drove the girls back to the school as their fathers hugged them
"So what happened?"
Swampman asked
"It was Jason,he defeated Freddy"
Goonie told him
"How did he kill Freddy,not even his old man could do that?"
The Mummy asked
"I defeated him mentally, stabbing shooting and burning him wouldn't do anything but i took back his fear and it drained him of his life"
You responded
(Eight months later)
It was the last day of school and you were in the woods writting in a journal
"This year was the best one yet we killed of Freddy krueger, we beat Calloway in the vollyball match,we got to see Elsa'd graduation and it's a shame she wouln't be us next year but this year was very peaceful, my relationship with Winnie is still strong as ever, i'm gonna invite them to Crystal lake for a summer vacation and their father said they could go i think they know their kids are safe in my hands plus my dad'll be their to "take care" of anyone inteneding otherwise, i just hope next year will be even better"
you finish writting closing your book admiring the trees as Winnie sat down next to you
"Hey J.J. thanks for saving us...twice"
she said grateful
"Anytime"
you responded as the two of you sharing a kiss
"I can't wait to see you in the summer"
Winnie said playing with her hair
"I can't wait for you girls to show up"
you said as she pulled a box of from under her dress handing it to you as you opened it seeing it was your drawing of her
"I was wondering if you could sign it for me"
she said as you pulled out a pencil signing it as you two sat their as you pulled out a knife
"Hey Winnie, lets carve our names in the tree"
you said carving a heart writting J.V.+W.W. inside a heart
as you two looked up at he sky
1411221221222212221121211212121111111111.title: The final chapter

info.brief_description: this takes place after Jason at ghoul school  (scooby doo related)
info.description:
(note feel free to add)this story takes place right after Jason at ghoul school where Jason return to the school (note in the the last story he went through the Mate ceramony with winnie but they are NOT married they can't until they are adults they are reserved for eachother but being a mate means they will always be there for each other) here is a list of the charecters
Students
Jason Voorhees(Jr.)-age 13 son of Jason Voorhees artististic wears the mask from part 5(blue lines)and Winnie's boyfriend
Elsa Frankenteen -age 18 daughter of frankenstein's monster strong but also mentally slow
Sibella Dracula - age 16 daughter of Count Dracula the most strongwilled
Phanty Phantom - age 15 daughter of the Phantom likes playing the pipe organ and is very funny
Winnie Werewolf -age 11 daughter of a Werewolf very athletic and tomboyish Jason's girlfriend
Tannis the Mummy - age 8 daughter of a Mummy very shy but very nice

The Villians
Revolta - a witch with magic powers who wants the girls for an evil army
Freddy Krueger - a demon who can kill people in there dreams has a new unbreakable claw
Michael Myer - a killer who wears a blue jumpsuit and a white mask dosn't talk and (unkillable)
Leatherface - a killer undead who wear human faces as masks and carries a Chainsaw (unkillable super strong durable)
Ghostface -a ghost who wears a black cloak and a white rubber mask calls people on the phone before killing them (unkillable teleport multiply phase through object ghost powers)
other charecters
Shaggy, Scooby , Scrappy Miss Grimwood the Calloway Cadets
